channel.title: Academic on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Academic on Strat

item.title: Doom: Scarydarkfast
item.description: I’m a big Doom head. An academic game studies / history book about Doom is right up my alley. 3/4 of the way through it so far and I’m enjoying it! It’s getting me excited to play the original Doom levels again and giving me some ideas on how I could go about writing about Doom levels.

item.title: Critical Directions In Comics Studies
item.description: Collection of academic articles in comics studies. Starts with a great comic strip introducing the collection itself followed by comic panels drawn by the authors of the articles themselves. Very cool!

item.title: The Comics World - Comic Books, Graphic Novels, And Their Publics
item.description: Collection of academic articles in comics studies.
